messages.explanation: Enemy category for dragons with boss healthbars in the world

messages.name: EnemyClass_Evergaol
messages.explanation: Enemy category for enemies fought in Evergaols, like the Crucible Knight in Stormhill

messages.name: EnemyClass_HostileNPC
messages.explanation: Enemy category for NPCs which fight you, including those who invade you or that you can invade

messages.name: EnemyClass_HostileNPCDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Hostile Humans. Notably it includes NPCs like Millicent and Sellen, because they appear multiple times in different locations, and it would be confusing to randomize them.
messages.english_text: Invaders and hostile NPCs without extensive quests
messages.text: 没有长任务链(出现于多个位置)的入侵与敌对NPC

messages.name: EnemyClass_Miniboss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for enemies with boss healthbars wandering the game world, not covered by other miniboss categories

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinibossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for World Minibosses
messages.english_text: Enemies with boss healthbars in the open world

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinorBoss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for boss encounters, usually with fog gates, including those in side dungeons (mini-dungeons)

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinorBossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Minor Bosses. Compare with the explanation for Major Bosses
messages.english_text: Other unescapable boss encounters, including side dungeon bosses
messages.text: 其余无法避开的BOSS(通常有雾门)，包括小型箱庭BOSS

messages.name: EnemyClass_NightMiniboss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for minibosses which roam the world at night

messages.name: EnemyClass_NightMinibossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Night Minibosses
messages.english_text: Minibosses which only spawn at night

messages.name: EnemyClass_Scarab
messages.explanation: Enemy category for scarabs (crystal lizard-like enemies)

messages.name: EnemyClass_Spectator
messages.explanation: Special enemy category which overlaps with other categories: enemies nearby bosses who are watching/spectating, and shouldn't be too powerful or else it will easily turn into a multi-boss fight.

messages.name: EnemyClass_SpectatorDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for configuring Spectators
messages.english_text: Special configuration for regular enemies who are nearby minibosses. This is meant to prevent unreasonably difficult open world fights.
messages.text:
靠近BOSS的常规敌人的特别配置。此项是为了防止不合理的野外战斗。
这类敌人过于强大的话，很容易演变成复数BOSS战斗。

messages.name: EnemyClass_Wildlife
messages.explanation: Enemy category for Wildlife who generally don't attack the player, like sheep and birds

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllBosses

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllBosses
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes all other specific boss types, simply called Bosses

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_BaseAllEnemies

messages.english_text: All Base Game Enemies and Bosses

messages.name: FormText_confirmReset
messages.explanation: UI message used in multiple forms, to reset settings/files/etc to their original state

messages.name: FormText_fileMissing
messages.explanation: UI message used in multiple forms. {0} is replaced with the name of the file that's required and missing

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_door
messages.explanation: In-game prompt which appears when trying to open the Chapel of Anticipation door when DLC Start is enabled. The player has to use the grace menu
messages.english_text: Closed because DLC Start is enabled. Use the grace instead.
messages.text:
门扉紧闭：已启用DLC开局模式！
请通过赐福进行传送。

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_enter
messages.explanation: Option in the grace menu in DLC Start. This warps to the beginning of the DLC in Gravesite Plain

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_enterBase
messages.explanation: Option in the grace menu in DLC Start with base game. This warps to early in the base game, but after the tutorial

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_enterConfirm
messages.explanation: After selecting 'Enter DLC' in the grace menu, yes/no prompt to warp to the DLC (Realm of Shadow: 幽影之地). This also reduces all starting runes to 0, since the runes are only given for level up
messages.english_text: Forfeit all runes and enter the realm of shadow?
messages.text: 舍弃所有卢恩并进入幽影之地？

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_enterConfirmBase
messages.explanation: After selecting 'Enter base game' in the grace menu, yes/no prompt to warp the base game. This also reduces all starting runes to 0, since the runes are only given for level up
messages.english_text: Forfeit all runes and enter the base game?
messages.text: 舍弃所有卢恩并进入本体游戏？

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_menu
messages.explanation: Option in the grace menu for the DLC Start submenu

messages.name: GameMenu_dlcStart_shop
messages.explanation: When dlcshop is enabled, option in the grace menu to open the shop submenu

messages.name: GameMenu_fogRunningError
messages.explanation:
Dialog message which appears in-game when Fog Gate Randomizer option is enabled, but the user attempted to launch Item/Enemy Randomizer without actually running Fog Gate Randomizer. The 
 is a line break. When Fog Gate Randomizer runs, it removes this error message.
messages.english_text:
Error: Unrestricted item placement was enabled in Item Randomizer,
but Fog Gate Randomizer was not detected
messages.text:
错误：在物品随机中启用了物品放置位置不受限制，
但未检测到雾门随机生成器。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintItemLabel
messages.explanation: Label placed in the in-game map, which includes an item name {0} and area name {1} with its exact location. For example: Talisman Pouch in Altus Plateau

messages.name: GameMenu_hintItemLabelArea
messages.explanation: Label placed in the in-game map for non-exact hints, with the item name {0} and vague area name {1}. For example: Sacred Tear somewhere in Lake of Rot

messages.name: GameMenu_hintLabelArea
messages.explanation: Label placed in the map for non-exact hints. For instance, 'Somewhere in Volcano Manor' is marked on the map to refer to any item location there. The location names are in the native language for each game language

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkArea
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the overall area (like Limgrave) of a required item on the map
messages.text: 标记所需物品所在区域

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkArea
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the overall area (like Limgrave) of a required item on the map
messages.english_text: Mark a required item's overall area
messages.text: 标记所需物品大体区域（如宁姆格福）

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkItem
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the exact location (like the corpse or boss to defeat) of a required item on the map
messages.english_text: Mark a required item's exact location (more expensive)
messages.text: 标记所需物品明确位置（价格更高）

messages.name: GameMenu_hintNoItems
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint, but all items seem to be acquired

messages.name: GameMenu_hintNoUpgradeItems
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint for an upgrade item (not a key item, but something like a Bell Bearing), but all items have been required

messages.name: GameMenu_hintPurchase
messages.explanation: Option in Kalé's NPC menu to purchase a map marker for a required item hint, added below the existing 'Purchase' option
messages.text: 购买所需物品位置标记

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequiredItem
messages.explanation: Generic name for a required item, to be shown in the map for required item hints. This would be used as the {0} name in hintItemLabel, so the final label would be: Required item in Volcano Manor

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailed
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint, but hint functionality is not available yet (they need to rest at an Altus Plateau Site of Grace first)
messages.english_text: Get to the Altus Plateau first!

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailedBoss
messages.explanation: Message shown in game when trying to select hintMarkItem, but the area boss was not defeated. This is a precaution to prevent people repeatedly getting hints without actually getting strong or fighting enemies. They can still get a non-exact hint in this case (hintMarkArea)
messages.english_text:
Exact location hints in an area are only
available after defeating the area's main boss.
messages.text:
仅在击败该区域的主要BOSS后，
才能获得该区域的明确位置标记。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailedOption
messages.explanation: Message shown in game when trying to select hintMarkItem, but the option for exact location hints was unchecked
messages.english_text: The randomizer option for exact location hints was not enabled.
messages.text: 随机生成器关于明确位置标记的设置未启用。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintUpgradePurchase
messages.explanation: Option given in Kalé's NPC menu to purchase a map marker for a specific ugprade item, which can be selected from a list. Examples of these items: Talisman Pouch, Sacred Tear, Smithing Stone Bell Bearing. These give hints for items from early game to late game, depending on which ones have already been acquired.
messages.text: 购买强化物品位置标记

messages.name: GameMenu_messmerShard
messages.explanation: In-game name of the item replacing Messmer's Kindling (梅瑟莫的火种) when it's split up into multiple shards. To burn the sealing tree, you need to collect some number of them

messages.name: GameMenu_messmerShardDesc
messages.explanation: In-game description for Messmer's Kindling Shards, with info added to the original description (能用于燃烧封印之树). {0} will get replaced with the number of shards required to burn the sealing tree, either 0 or >1
messages.english_text: Burns the sealing tree, with {0} required
messages.text: 燃烧封印之树，需要数量为{0}

messages.name: GameMenu_receiveBellBearing
messages.explanation: Option added to merchants in-game, alongside Purchase/Sell menus, which gives the player their Bell Bearing without killing them

messages.name: GameMenu_restart
messages.explanation: Error message shown in-game when the randomizer can load all required files. It normally happens if someone re-runs randomizer without restarting the game, but it can also happen after game updates if the regulation.bin becomes invalid and no longer loads.
messages.english_text:
Error: Mismatch between regulation.bin and other randomizer files.
Restart the game and make sure the game and randomizer versions are compatible.
messages.text:
错误：regulation.bin与其他随机生成器文件不匹配。
重启游戏并确保游戏与随机生成器的版本兼容。

messages.name: GameMenu_restart
messages.explanation:
Error message shown in-game when the randomizer can load all required files. The 
 corresponds to a line change. This normally happens if someone re-runs randomizer without restarting the game, but it can also happen after game updates if the regulation.bin becomes invalid and no longer loads. Finally, it can happen if the randomizer is incorrectly installed, and some critical files are detected as missing.
messages.english_text:
Error: Mismatch between regulation.bin and other randomizer files.
Make sure all randomizer files are present, the game has been restarted
after randomization, and the game and regulation.bin versions are compatible.
messages.text:
错误：regulation.bin与其他随机生成器文件不匹配。
确保所有随机生成器文件目前存在、游戏在随机化之后已经重启，
以及游戏与随机生成器的版本兼容。

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Armor
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game armor

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_AshOfWar
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game Ashes of War

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Cookbooks
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game cookbooks (for example: 传道士的制作笔记【１】, 调香师的制作笔记【２】)

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_CraftingContainers
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game crafting containers. Cracked Pots, Ritual Pots, and Perfume Bottles

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_CrystalTear
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game crystal tears (结晶露滴)

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Incantation
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game incantations

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_ReusableTool
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with reusable base game 'tools' (无限次 + 道具) which sometimes use FP, like the revenant bell or Margit's Shackle

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Sorcery
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game sorceries

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_SpiritAsh
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game summonable spirit ashes

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Talisman
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game talismans

messages.name: GameMenu_ShopCat_Weapon
messages.explanation: Option in the base game shop in DLC Start to browse a shop with base game weapons

messages.name: GameMenu_springsealBy
messages.explanation: Message which pops up in-game when spiritspring seals are randomized, when toppling a stone stack. {0} is a nearby location, like 'Moorth Ruins' for the Scadu Altus spiritspring. This is a modified version of the vanilla message: 某处的灵魂气流封印已解开。
messages.english_text: A spiritspring has been unsealed by {0}
messages.text: {0}的一处灵魂气流封印已解开。

messages.name: GameMenu_springsealIn
messages.explanation: Message which pops up in-game when spiritspring seals are randomized, when toppling a stone stack. {0} a broad location the spiritspring is located in, like 'Gravesite Plain'. This is a modified version of the vanilla message: 某处的灵魂气流封印已解开。
messages.english_text: A spiritspring has been unsealed in {0}
messages.text: {0}的一处灵魂气流封印已解开。

messages.name: GameMenu_upgradeScadu
messages.explanation: Menu option which appears in the DLC grace menu when DLC randomization is enabled, under Shadow Realm Blessing, to upgrade all blessings at once (not implemented yet)

messages.name: GameMenu_upgradeScaduDone
messages.explanation: Message which appears in the DLC grace menu when using 'Upgrade all', combining: 已加强幽影树庇佑。 + 已加强灵灰庇佑。
messages.english_text: Scadutree Blessing and Revered Spirit Ash Blessing empowered
messages.text: 已加强幽影树庇佑/灵灰庇佑。

messages.name: GameMenu_upgradeScaduMissing
messages.explanation: Message which appears in the DLC grace menu when attempting to use 'Upgrade all' but there's nothing to upgrade, combining: 幽影树碎片的数量不足。 + 灵灰的数量不足。
messages.english_text: Not enough Scadutree Fragments or Revered Spirit Ashes
messages.text: 幽影树碎片/灵灰数量不足。

messages.name: HelperForm_active
messages.explanation: Shown in the RandomizerHelper settings when RandomizerHelper is enabled and when it emits active logs. This can be seen by running the game with RandomizerHelper active. {0} is a localized timestamp. For example, in English: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 1:45:30 PM

messages.name: HelperForm_activity
messages.explanation: Shown in the RandomizerHelper settings when RandomizerHelper is enabled but no active logs are detected. This can be seen by removing dll/RandomizerHelper_log.txt if it exists

messages.name: HelperForm_HelperForm
messages.explanation: title of the RandomizerHelper settings window

messages.name: HelperForm_helperL
messages.explanation: Basic info at the top of the RandomizerHelper settings window. As soon as any checkbox/textbox is changed, the mod's behavior will change while the game is running
messages.english_text: When RandomizerHelper is active, changes to these settings will immediately apply without needing to rerun randomizer or restart the game.
messages.text: 当随机化助手处于活动时，对这些设置的修改将会立即应用，无需重启随机生成器或重启游戏。

messages.name: HelperForm_okButton
messages.explanation: Standard dialog confirmation button

messages.name: HelperForm_resetButton
messages.explanation: Button in the RandomizerHelper settings window to reset all of the dll settings to their original values. This shows a yes/no prompt to confirm

messages.name: HelperOptions_autoEquip
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option to enable auto-equip of weapons, armor, etc, when they are acquired. Each have their own settings below

messages.name: HelperOptions_autoUpgrade
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option to enable auto-upgrading items when they are acquired

messages.name: HelperOptions_autoUpgradeDropped
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option to enable change the upgrade level of items (weapons/spirit ashes/etc) after they've been acquired normally, by using '放置原地' from the equipment menu and picking the item up again
messages.english_text: Auto-upgrade items which are left on the ground and picked up
messages.text: 自动强化使用"放置原地"后再次拾取的物品

messages.name: HelperOptions_autoUpgradeSpiritAshes
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option to enable auto-upgrading summonable spirit ashes. If the player has a max +5 in their inventory, any new ashes will be +5
messages.english_text: Auto-upgrade spirit ashes to the highest level achieved so far
messages.text: 自动强化骨灰至当前最高骨灰等级

messages.name: HelperOptions_autoUpgradeWeapons
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option to enable auto-upgrading weapons when they are acquired. The level is based on the max weapon level the player has previously reached. This value is also used for PvP matchmaking
messages.english_text: Auto-upgrade weapons to the player's max weapon level
messages.text: 自动强化武器至当前最高武器等级

messages.name: HelperOptions_bowLeft
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when weapon auto-equip is enabled, to replace the left-hand weapon with bows. If disabled, it will go into the right hand instead
messages.english_text: Equip bows in the left hand

messages.name: HelperOptions_castLeft
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when weapon auto-equip is enabled, to replace the left-hand weapon with staffs and seals. If disabled, it will go into the right hand instead
messages.english_text: Equip spell-casting weapons in the left hand

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipAccessory
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when auto-equip is enabled, to replace equipped talismans when any new ones are acquired

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipArmor
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when auto-equip is enabled, to equip armor when it's acquired

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipCrystalTears
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when auto-equip is enabled, to equip crystal tears into the Physick Flask when they are acquired

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipShop
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when auto-equip is enabled, to auto-equip items acquired from shops. If disabled, only pickups/drops are auto-equipped
messages.text: 自动装备从商店购买的道具

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipSpells
messages.explanation: RandomizerHelper option when auto-equip is enabled, to auto-equip sorceries and incantations when they are acquired

messages.name: HelperOptions_equipWeapons
messages.explanation: RandomizerOption when auto-equip is enabled, to auto-equip weapons and shields when they are acquired
messages.text: 自动装备武器(包括火把、盾牌等)

messages.name: HelperOptions_regionLockWeapons
messages.explanation: RandomizerOption when auto-upgrade weapons is enabled. Even if the player's max weapon level is +25, if they get a weapon in Limgrave, it will only be upgraded to +3, the max level for the region
messages.english_text: Limit max auto-upgrade level based on the region where the weapon is acquired
messages.text: 根据获取武器的区域限制强化武器等级

messages.name: HelperOptions_weaponLevelRange
messages.explanation: RandomizerOption when auto-upgrade weapons is enabled, for a textbox to choose a weapon level from 0 to 25. It describes how an example upgrade level is modified randomly
messages.english_text: Nerf auto-upgrade by reducing weapons' levels by a random amount. If set to 3, an auto-upgrade level of +10 (+4 somber) gives a +8 +9 or +10 weapon (+3 or +4 somber)
messages.text:
↑自动强化武器时将会随机降低等级。如果设置成3，自动强化等级为普通+10(失色+4)。
则自动强化后武器为普通+8、+9，或+10(失色+3或+4)

messages.name: HelperOptions_weaponLevelsBelowMax
messages.explanation: RandomizerOption when auto-upgrade weapons is enabled, for a textbox to choose a weapon level from 0 to 25. It describes how an example upgrade level is modified by a fixed amount
messages.english_text: Nerf auto-upgrade by reducing weapons' levels by a fixed amount. If set to 3, an auto-upgrade level of +20 (+8 somber) gives a +17 weapon (+7 somber)
messages.text:
↑自动强化武器时将会固定降低等级。如果设置成3，自动强化等级为普通+20(失色+8)。
则自动强化后武器为普通+17(失色+7)

messages.name: ItemPreset_AreaSiloType_DLC
messages.explanation: Option in custom item placement. When selected, base game items are only placed in the base game, and DLC items are only placed in the DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_AreaSiloType_None
messages.explanation: Option in custom item placement. When selected, there is no separation between items from different sources

messages.name: ItemPreset_descEntry
messages.explanation: Entry in a description of an item preset. {0} is a type of item placement, {1} is the full description for it

messages.name: ItemPreset_descExclude
messages.explanation: In a description of custom item placement, {0} is a list of locations where certain items are excluded from appearing, like minidungeons or night bosses

messages.name: ItemPreset_descItemLine
messages.explanation: In a description of custom item placement, {0} is a list of items in a placement. The hyphen is indenting the previous lines, like a bulleted list.

messages.name: ItemPreset_descNone
messages.explanation: In a description of custom item placement, this text is shown when no items or locations are specified. This usually means the placement rule is not used.

messages.name: ItemPreset_descRequire
messages.explanation: In a description of custom item placement, {0} is a list of locations where certain items must appear, like important locations

messages.name: ItemPreset_descRequireExclude
messages.explanation: In a description of custom item placement, this is a combination of descRequire and descExclude. {0} is a list of locations where certain items must appear, and {1} is a list of locations where certain items may not appear

messages.name: ItemPreset_descRequireExcludeLoc
messages.explanation: Another variant of descRequireExclude which is used when the thing being described is a location, so 'Placed in' would be redundant

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_accessories
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all talismans

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_arrows
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all arrow and bolt ammunition (箭／弩箭)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_bosssouls
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all boss remembrances, like 穿刺者的追忆 and 艾尔登的追忆

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_containers
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all crafting containers: Cracked Pots, Ritual Pots, Perfume Bottles, and Hefty Cracked Pots

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_cookbooks
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all cookbooks, like 传道士的制作笔记【１】 and 调香师的制作笔记【２】

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_craftingmats
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all items used for crafting (制作道具的材料)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_crystaltears
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all Crystal Tears (结晶露滴)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_gems
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all Ash of War items which can be equipped to weapons (战灰)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_greatrunes
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all demi-god Great Runes (大卢恩)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_incantations
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all incantations

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_itemashes
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all Bell Bearings containing crafting materials, like 兽骨贩子的铃珠 and 霉菌贩子的铃珠. This does not include Bell Bearings from NPC shops or containing upgrade materials
messages.text: 制作道具的材料类铃珠

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_keyitems
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all major key items

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_paintings
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all paintings which can be used in painting puzzles

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_prayerbooks
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all incantation prayerbooks, like 黄金树祷告书 and 神皮祷告书

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_protectors
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all armor

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_questitems
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all quest items

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_regularstones
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all regular smithing stones, which can be used to upgrade weapons to +25

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_scrolls
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all sorcery scrolls, like 学院卷轴 and 教室卷轴

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_somberstones
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all somber smithing stones, which can be used to upgrade special weapons to +10 only

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_sorceries
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all sorceries

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_souls
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all items which can be consumed to gain runes, excluding remembrances. For example, 黄金卢恩【１】 and 稀人卢恩

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_spiritashes
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all summonable spirits (骨灰)

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_upgradeashes
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all bell bearings containing upgrade materials, like 锻造石矿工的铃珠【１】 and 铃兰摘采工的铃珠【１】

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_weapons
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all weapons

messages.name: ItemPreset_ItemGroup_whetblades
messages.explanation: Custom item group consisting of all whetblades which can be used to change weapon affinity, like 铁制砥石刀 and 漆黑砥石刀

messages.name: ItemPreset_keyItemSilo
messages.explanation: Label used to determine which silo key items are placed in, like whether DLC and base game key items can be mixed together. This is a separate option from overallKeySilo, allowing key items to be restricted but other items aren't. A silo is an isolated region and can be also called a partition, division, etc. In the future, other silos may exist, such as region or item type

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_altboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for boss drops other than major bosses

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_altboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for boss drops other than major bosses. This was previously 'Other bosses' but changed when additional boss categories were added

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_basin
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for Crystal Tears which can be picked up at the base of Minor Erdtrees, like in Mistwood or Capital Outskirts. See the item description for the Flask of Wondrous Physick where they are described

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_bluegraves
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for DLC-only glowing blue graves containing Larval Tears which only spawn at night. The spiritgraves are referenced in the DLC Larval Tear item description
messages.text: 夜间出现的蓝色灵墓(获取泪滴幼体)

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_boss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for major bosses

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_catacomb
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all locations in catacombs, such as 风暴根脚的地下墓地 and 雾谷地下墓地

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_catacombboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in catacombs

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_cave
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all locations in caves, such as 蒙流洞窟 and 安身洞窟

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_caveboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in caves

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_cellarbosschest
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for items in chests after bosses which don't drop items. 'Cellar boss' refers to their location (地下室), including bosses like 鲜血贵族 and “亚人女王”姬丽卡

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_chest
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all items in chests

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_church
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all places where Sacred Tears appear in the vanilla game, in Churches of Marika

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_cookbook
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places where cookbooks appear in the vanilla game

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_criticalpath
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for non-major bosses which are on the 'critical path', required to reach major bosses, but not major bosses themselves.
messages.text: 前往主要BOSS关键路径上的非主要BOSS

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_cross
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places where Scadutree Fragments (幽影树碎片) can be found under Miquella's Cross (米凯拉的十字记号) in the DLC
messages.text: 米凯拉的十字记号下的幽影树碎片

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_dlc
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for the entire DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_dragonboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for dragon bosses which are the open world, not closed arenas. For example, “古龙”兰斯桑克斯 and “步入腐败”艾格基斯

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_enemyfragment
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all of the enemy drops which give Scadutree Fragments (幽影树碎片) in the vanilla game, excluding places where they can picked up off the ground
messages.text: 敌人掉落的幽影树碎片

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_enemyrevered
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all of the enemy drops which give Revered Spirit Ashes (灵灰) in the vanilla game, excluding places where they can picked up off the ground

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_enemytalisman
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all of the enemy drops which give talismans in the vanilla game, excluding places where talismans can picked up off the ground

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_evergaol
messages.explanation: Descriptionn of custom item placement for evergaol boss drops, like in 风暴山丘的封印监牢 or 刀之首的封印监牢

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_forge
messages.explanation: Descrption of custom item placement for items given by completing a forge in the DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_forge
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for any items in a forge, like 熔岩管锻造遗迹 or 泰乌尔锻造遗迹. Note this changed from a previous version, since rewards are now covered by forgereward.

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_forgereward
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for items given by completing a forge in the DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_fragment
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places *other* than Miquella's Cross where Scadutree Fragments (幽影树碎片) can be found as pickups on the ground
messages.text: 米凯拉的十字记号以外可拾取幽影树碎片

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_furnacegolem
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for drops from Furnace Golems, the giant wickerman enemies in the DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_gaol
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all locations in gaols, such as 贝瑞特监牢 and 喟叹监牢

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_gaolboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in gaols

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_grave
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all locations in Hero's Graves, such as 亚雷萨英雄墓地 and 格密尔英雄墓地

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_graveboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in Hero's Graves

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_hangingpot
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for DLC hanging pots containing bell bearings

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_minidungeon
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all items in minidungeons, like caves, catacombs, etc
messages.text: 小型箱庭(洞窟、地下墓地等)

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_minidungeonboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in any minidungeon, like caves, catacombs, etc.

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_missable
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all items which are known to be missable if a location or quest becomes unavailable
messages.text: 可能错过(位置/任务不可用)

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_namelessmausoleum
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in Nameless Mausoleums in the DLC such as 西方无名灵庙

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_night
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for items dropped by minibosses which only spawn at night, like Night's Cavalry and Deathbirds

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_nodlc
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for the entire base game, excluding the DLC

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_overworldboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses which are the open world, not closed arenas (and not underground either)

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_painting
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for items which can be looted from paintings, like in Artist's Shacks

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_racemode
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places major key items appear in the base game

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_raceshop
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for almost all regular shops in the game, such as Nomadic Merchant shops and NPCs like Patches and Moore

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_revered
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places where Revered Spirit Ashes (灵灰) can be found as pickups on the ground

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_rise
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for treasures in glintstone sorcery rises like 雷恩魔法师塔 and 提斯魔法师塔, often containing Memory Stones in the vanilla game

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_seedtree
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for items at illusory trees which are normally Golden Seeds in the vanilla game

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_talisman
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all the places where talismans can be found as pickups on the ground

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_tunnel
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all locations in tunnels, such as 宁姆格福坑道 and 封印坑道

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_tunnelboss
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for bosses in tunnels

messages.name: ItemPreset_LocationGroup_upgradeshop
messages.explanation: Description of custom item placement for all of the places where upgrade bell bearings can be found in the vanilla game

messages.name: ItemPreset_norandomItems
messages.explanation: Label in custom item placement to configure items which are never randomized

messages.name: ItemPreset_overallSilo
messages.explanation: Label used to determine which silo items are placed in, like whether DLC and base game items can be mixed together. A silo is an isolated region and can be also called a partition, division, etc.

messages.name: ItemPreset_placementExcludes
messages.explanation: Label shown in the custom item placement form, like for Important locations. Configured items are prevented from appearing in these locations. See also placementRequires

messages.name: ItemPreset_placementItems
messages.explanation: Label shown in the custom item placement form before a configurable list of items

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementMode_Anywhere
messages.explanation: Placement mode which can be selected in custom item placement. If selected, the items can appear anywhere (except excluded locations)

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementMode_Custom
messages.explanation: Placement mode which can be selected in custom item placement. If selected, the user can select further where items must appear and/or cannot appear

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementMode_Important
messages.explanation: Placement mode which can be selected in custom item placement. If selected, the items' locations are whatever is configured under Important locations

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementMode_Norandom
messages.explanation: Placement mode which can be selected in custom item placement. If selected, the items are not randomized

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementModeDesc_Important
messages.explanation: Detailed description for custom item placement rules for important locations. 'Pass' means that first all important location items are placed, then all other items are placed after that in the remaining locations.
messages.english_text: Placement for items configured to appear in important locations. This is done in a pass before all other items in the game, to ensure they have highest priority for placement. If they can't be placed, randomization will fail.
messages.text:
出现在重要位置的物品放置设置。它们将于所有其他物品之前完成放置，以确保拥有最高的放置优先级。
如果无法被放置，随机化将会失败。

messages.name: ItemPreset_placementOverall
messages.explanation: Label for possible placement modes which can be selected in custom item placement

messages.name: ItemPreset_placementRequires
messages.explanation: Label shown in the custom item placement form, like for Important locations. Configured items may only appear in these locations. See also placementExcludes

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_BaseOnlyItems
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place certain items in the base game only (not DLC)
messages.text: 仅于本体游戏放置的物品

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_BossTools
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to prevent certain items from appearing at bosses when they are required to defeat bosses

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_CoreMechanics
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place certain critical items like Talisman Pouches, Physick Flask, etc either in important locations or custom configuration

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_Custom
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place configured items in configured locations. Not used yet

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_DlcOnlyItems
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place certain items in the DLC only

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_KeyItems
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place key items either in important locations or custom configuration

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_QuestItems
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place quest items in configured locations

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_SacredFlaskUpgrades
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place Golden Seed/Sacred Tear in configured locations

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_ShadowRealmBlessings
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place Scadutree Blessing/Revered Spirit Ash in configured locations (幽影之地的庇佑)
messages.text: 幽影之地的庇佑(幽影树碎片/灵灰)

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementType_UpgradeBellBearings
messages.explanation: Description for custom item placement rules to place Bell Bearings with upgrade materials in configured locations

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementTypeDesc_BaseOnlyItems
messages.explanation: Detailed description for custom item placement rules for base-game-only items
messages.english_text: Items which are only placed in the base game when they are randomized. Cannot include key or quest items currently.
messages.text: 随机后仅于本体游戏放置的物品。目前不包括关键或任务物品。

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementTypeDesc_DlcOnlyItems
messages.explanation: Detailed description for custom item placement rules for DLC-only items
messages.english_text: Items which are only placed in the DLC when they are randomized. Cannot include key or quest items currently.
messages.text: 随机后仅于DLC放置的物品。目前不包括关键或任务物品。

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementTypeDesc_KeyItems
messages.explanation: Detailed description for custom item placement rules for major key items, defining what counts as a major key item
messages.english_text: Placement for key items which unlock areas containing unmissable items
messages.text: 解锁包含不可错过物品的区域的关键物品的放置

messages.name: ItemPreset_PlacementTypeDesc_QuestItems
messages.explanation: Detailed description for custom item placement rules for major key items, defining what counts as a quest item
messages.english_text: Placement for items which advance quests but are not otherwise required to access areas
messages.text: 用于推进任务但并非进入区域所需的物品的放置

messages.name: ItemPreset_randomItems
messages.explanation: Label in custom item placement to configure items which *are* randomized when normally they wouldn't be. Not used yet

messages.name: MergeModForm_clear
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which clears the merged mod textbox

messages.name: MergeModForm_dir
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a mod directory

messages.name: MergeModForm_MergeModForm
messages.explanation: Title of 'Merge other mod' dialog box

messages.name: MergeModForm_reg
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a regulation.bin file

messages.name: MergeModForm_toml
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a toml file, such as Mod Engine's config_eldenring.toml file, which contains a list of mods to launch. This allows merging multiple mods into randomizer.

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorInternal
messages.explanation: Internal error for 'Set options from string', when it somehow starts out with invalid options

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorNoOptions
messages.explanation: Validation error for 'Set options from string' when no actual option names are provided, only a number
messages.text: 无效设置：必须包含选项

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorNoVersion
messages.explanation: Validation error for 'Set options from string', when the given value doesn't contain an option named v1 v2 etc.
messages.english_text: Invalid options: must contain a version number
messages.text: 无效设置：必须包含版本号

messages.name: OptionsForm_OptionsForm
messages.explanation: Title for 'Set options from string' dialog box

messages.name: OptionsForm_select
messages.explanation: Button in 'Set options from string' dialog box which sets options based on the textbox contents

messages.name: OptionsForm_strL
messages.explanation: Long explanation for using 'Set options from string' dialog box. The text box shows the user's current 'option string' (all of their selected options and seed)
messages.english_text:
This text box allows you to give your options and seed to someone else (after running randomization) and to copy someone else's options.
This string can also be found on the first line of hint/spoiler logs in the spoiler_logs directory.
Also, you can set it to blank to restore all default options.
messages.text:
①: 该文本框允许你将自己的设置与种子分享给他人(随机化运行结束后)以及复制他人的设置。
②: 该字符串也能在spoiler_logs目录下提示/剧透日志中的第一行找到。
③: 清空该文本框即可重置默认设置。

messages.name: Preset_adjustSource
messages.explanation: Summary of a Frequency Adjustment. {0} is a percent number (so 'Adjusted to 50%' means cut in half) and {1} is a list of enemies affected

messages.name: Preset_dlcDisclaimer1
messages.explanation: Disclaimer for enemy randomizer so people don't expect too much
messages.english_text: Warning: This is an unstable alpha release of enemy randomizer for DLC. Merging boss categories is much more unstable because it requires significantly more event rewriting. Due to inconsistent scaling tiers, enemies and bosses may deal way too much or too little damage. Enemy onslaught is not supported in the DLC yet.
messages.text: 警告：该版本处于DLC敌人随机的不稳定α测试。合并BOSS类别会相当不稳定，因为它明显需要进行更多的事件重写。并且由于伤害倍率的不一致，敌人与BOSS可能造成过高或过低的伤害。此外：DLC暂不支持敌人倍增模式。

messages.name: Preset_dlcsilo
messages.explanation: Summary of custom enemy placement when PresetEditForm_dlcsilo is selected
messages.english_text: DLC bosses and enemies randomized separately

messages.name: Preset_dontRandomize
messages.explanation: Summary of not-randomized enemies. {0} is a list of enemies who are not randomized

messages.name: Preset_enemyMultiplier
messages.explanation: Enemy multiplier mode, a type of run where {0} is a number like 2 or 3. It is based on a DS3 mod where every enemy is doubled or tripled

messages.name: Preset_enemyMultiplierDesc
messages.explanation: Enemy category description with an multiplier added, used when Enemy Onslaught is enabled and has an override for a specific category. {0} is a number like 2 or 3, {1} is a class like Major Bosses. All together, this would result in something like '2x Major Bosses'

messages.name: Preset_oopsAll
messages.explanation: Oops All mode, where all enemies are replaced with the enemy named in {0}. The phrase is based on an American cereal https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/oops-all-berries-box-parodies, and in this case, DS1 enemy randomizer runs by streamer LobosJr where he was constantly running into enemies who turned into Gwyn.

messages.name: Preset_options
messages.explanation: Summary of custom options enabled for the preset, where {0} is a comma-separated list of preset options. This is currently not used, since the options are just listed one-by-one

messages.name: Preset_poolDefault
messages.explanation: When listing customized enemies getting replaced, refers to enemies in the same category. 'Replacing Major Bosses: Themselves' means that major bosses will replace other major bosses

messages.name: Preset_poolDelimitEntry
messages.explanation: Separation text between different enemies in a list (like 'Rat; Dog'). This shouldn't be a comma, since enemy names can contain commas

messages.name: Preset_poolDelimitType
messages.explanation: Separation text between different enemy categories in a list (like 'Major Bosses, Minor Bosses')

messages.name: Preset_poolDesc
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category, shown in {0}, where the description is on the next line.

messages.name: Preset_poolDescDlc
messages.explanation: Variant of Preset_poolDesc which adds briefly that DLC enemies/bosses are randomized separately for that category in custom enemy placement, before describing placement on the next line

messages.name: Preset_poolDescInherit
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category, shown in {0}, where it uses the same logic as a different enemy category in {1}. This is not currently shown, since it's duplicated instead.

messages.name: Preset_poolDescOneLine
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category all on one line. You might have 'Replacing Major Bosses: Rat; Dog', which means that every major boss will turn into either a rat or a dog

messages.name: Preset_poolDescOneLineDlc
messages.explanation: Variant of Preset_poolDescOneLine which adds adds briefly that DLC enemies/bosses are randomized separately for that category

messages.name: Preset_poolEntries
messages.explanation: Part of multiline summary for enemy category customization. The - is a bullet point, then it might say '50% Dog'. All the different lines add up to 100%.

messages.name: Preset_poolExclude

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmMultiplyRandom
messages.explanation: Yes/no prompt which is shown when switching from normal randomization to enemy onslaught (multiplied enemies). When Yes is chosen, enemy randomization is temporarily disabled, meaning that the original enemy will just be copied instead of copied *and* randomized
messages.english_text: Disable enemy randomization with Enemy Onslaught?
messages.text: 是否以禁用敌人随机的方式启用敌人倍增模式？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmNorandom
messages.explanation: Yes/no prompt which appears when trying to add 'Not randomized' to a custom enemy category. One way to make this appear is to edit custom enemy placement, click Reset, select the dropdown next to the '100%' textbox, and select 'Not randomized' from the dropdown. The 'Not randomized' selection is a way to not randomize a % of enemies, and it makes no sense for a group to both specify source enemies and say that none should be randomized. If the user clicks Yes, the editor automatically clicks the + button to make a new group and adds 'Not randomized' there.
messages.english_text: "Not randomized" can't be added to this source group because other enemies are already configured. Would you like to create a new group to set a percentage for non-random enemies?
messages.text: 无法将"不随机"添加到该资源组，因为已经配置了其他敌人。你需要创建一个新资源组来配置不随机敌人的百分比吗？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmOverwrite
messages.explanation: Dialog text for 'Save as' or 'Create new' when the preset filename already exists

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmReset

messages.text: 将该预设重置为默认值？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmTitle
messages.explanation: Generic title for confirm dialog box

messages.name: PresetEditForm_createNew
messages.explanation: In the 'Preset:' dropdown, a special option which prompts the name of a new preset to create

messages.name: PresetEditForm_customHelpText
messages.explanation: Long explanation for using the custom enemy editor which can be accessed by clicking on the '?' link in a particular enemy category. This refers to other parts of the UI which have their own entries. Please ask me if you'd like further explanation for any of this, since this text tries to communicate how the randomizer works internally, which is complicated, and how to configure it, which is also complicated.
messages.english_text:
Enemy randomizer works by swapping out enemies with other enemies taken from elsewhere in the game. It does this independently for each enemy category. Here you can configure a custom list of source enemies which can replace enemies in this category. You can also merge some categories together, by selecting "Merge with" in subcategories, or clicking on "Quick edit" links below to do this automatically.

When configuring source enemies, you can click the + button to add a new source group. The % probability across all groups in a category must add up to 100%. If you want 10% of enemies in this category to become any boss, use a 90% group with "Same category" and a 10% group with "All Bosses". If you want only 50% of enemies in this category to be randomized, use a 50% group with "Same category" and a 50% group with "Not randomized".
messages.text:
敌人随机的运行机制为交换不同地方的敌人。对于不同类别的敌人设置都是独立的。
在此，你可以配置一个自定义的敌人资源列表来替换该类别的敌人。
你也可以通过在子类资源列表中选择"与XX合并"或者点击下方的"快速编辑"自动合并某些类别。
配置敌人资源时，可以单击"+"按钮添加一个新的资源组。同一个类别中所有资源组的百分比必须加起来刚好为100%。
如果你想让此项类别中10%的敌人变为任意BOSS，可以用一个90%的"同类别"资源组与一个10%的"全类别BOSS"资源组进行组合。
如果你只想让此项类别50%的敌人进行随机，那就用一个50%的"同类别"资源组与一个50%的"不随机"资源组进行组合。

messages.name: PresetEditForm_loadFailure
messages.explanation: Error shown when selecting a preset, but it can't be parsed or doesn't exist. {0} is the preset name, and {1} on the next line is the full error message

messages.name: PresetEditForm_manual
messages.explanation: Title for custom enemy configuration where specific enemies can replace each other (like configuring Margit to be Radahn), as a list item on the left side of the dialog

messages.name: PresetEditForm_manualDesc
messages.explanation: Further explanation for manual placement of enemies. This allows selecting enemy targets to replace with specific other enemies. The 'id' being referenced here can be seen in files in the spoiler_logs directory after generating a run, like Margit's id is shown as 10000850
messages.english_text: Manual placement replaces individual enemies by id or type. It overrides all other configuration and ignores ALL placement safety heuristics. To replace specific enemy instances, you can input their unique numerical id found in spoiler logs.
messages.text: 手动配置通过id或类型替换敌人个体。它会覆盖其他所有设置并忽略所有放置安全启发式。如果想自己进行特定敌人个体实例的替换，可在spoiler_logs目录下日志中找到其对应的唯一数字id并于此输入。

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeCustom
messages.explanation: Normal mode for customization which is not one of the special modes

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeMultiply
messages.explanation: Dropdown label for special mode (not yet implemented) which duplicates all enemies. See Preset_enemyMultiplier

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeOopsall
messages.explanation: Dropdown label for special mode which turns all enemies into the same type. See Preset_oopsAll

messages.name: PresetEditForm_multiplyOption
messages.explanation: Textbox for Enemy Onslaught mode where {0} is a number like 2 or 3, indicating double or triple enemies.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_okButton
messages.explanation: Button which saves changes and closes the form

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolDefault
messages.explanation: Type of enemy replacement within the same category, so for Major Bosses, this means other Major Bosses. This used to be what appeared in the enemy editor, but now poolDefaultExplain is used

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolDefaultExplain
messages.explanation: Type of enemy replacement within the same category, so for Major Bosses, this means other Major Bosses. This shows up in the enemy editor for each enemy category with custom source groups. The {0} is the name of the current category. The reason why this is used, instead of just saying the category name by itself, is because of the 'Copy config from <other category>' option. For example, suppose that Regular Enemies are replaced with Same category (Regular Enemies). If Passive Wildlife copies its config from Regular Enemies, then it will be replaced with Same category (Passive Wildlife) instead, because the meaning of the current category is different there.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolEnemies
messages.explanation: Percent sign which appears after a textbox with a number from 0 to 100

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolSource
messages.explanation: The enemy which replaces another enemy in Manual Placement in custom enemy placement. This comes *after* poolTarget, so the entire thing reads as Enemy: Margit; Replacement: Radahn. This means when you enter Margit's boss arena, Radahn will be there

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolTarget
messages.explanation: The enemy which gets replaced in Manual Placement in custom enemy placement. See poolSource

messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all enemy categories to merge with parent, making everything randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeAll
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all enemy categories to merge with parent, making everything randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeBoss
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all boss enemy categories to merge with parent, making bosses randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeBoss
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all boss enemy categories to merge with parent, making bosses randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeMinor
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes boss categories other than Major Bosses to merge with each other. This makes it so that Major Bosses are still challenging, but other bosses have more variety

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickReducePassive

messages.text: 降低被动敌人出现概率

messages.text: 以全类别BOSS替换10%的常规敌人

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickReplaceWildlife

messages.text: 以常规敌人替换野生动物

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickSeparate
messages.explanation: Quick edit which is the opposite of quickMerge options. It changes all categories to not merge with parent.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_redundantEnemyTooltip
messages.explanation: Popup message in the preset form when hovering over an enemy which has been added to a source group, but is redundant to a different enemy. You can make this happen by going to custom enemy placement, resetting it, and adding a basic enemy like 'Albinauric' in the textbox which is next to 'Same category (Regular Enemies)'. After submitting 'Albinauric', it should be greyed out in the list, and hovering over it will show {0} as the redundant enemy, and {1} as the bigger category that already includes it.
messages.english_text: "{0}" can be removed from this list because it's already included in "{1}".
messages.text: "{0}" 可从列表中移除,因为它已包含在 "{1}" 之内。

messages.name: PresetEditForm_redundantEnemyTooltipPool
messages.explanation: This message is appended to redundantEnemyTooltip in the case when a redundant enemy was just added to a source group (e.g. the textbox next to 'Same category (Regular Enemies)', but not the textbox next to 'Excluded'). Source groups define which enemies can replace other enemies in a category, and the + button allows configuring multiple source groups with different probabilities of showing up. A common misconception is that adding more enemies to a single list will give those enemies a higher chance of showing up, which is not true if those enemies were already in the list, so this line recommends using multiple source groups for actually configuring enemy replacement probability.
messages.english_text: Use the + button if you want to make a separate source group with this enemy.
messages.text: 如果你想创建一个该敌人的独立资源组,点击"+"按钮。

messages.name: PresetEditForm_removeSource
messages.explanation: Label for a list of enemies which are not added anywhere in the game

messages.name: PresetEditForm_resetButton

messages.name: PresetEditForm_saveFailure

messages.name: PresetItemForm_alphaL
messages.explanation: Disclaimer at the bottom of the custom item placement form. This has three separate comments. First is a disclaimer. Second is that more groups of items/locations will be added, which requires classification and handling for logic. Third, another disclaimer that missable locations are inaccurate, where 'base game' means non-DLC in this context.
messages.english_text: Custom item placement is in alpha and may result in failed randomizations. Other item groups, locations, and silos will be added in the future. Also note that many unmissable base game locations are considered missable since they're not yet documented.
messages.text:
自定义物品放置仍处于α测试，因此可能出现随机化失败。未来还将添加其他的物品资源组、位置以及分区。
另请注意，许多不可错过的本体游戏位置目前被识别为可能错过，是因为它们尚未被记录进来。

messages.text: 如果项目明显多于可用位置，随机化将会失败。

messages.name: PresetItemForm_listLocationsRegular
messages.explanation: Disclaimer shown when selecting locations in custom item placement, like when Sacred Flask Upgrades use Custom placement, that locations may be ignored if not all items can fit there
messages.english_text: If there are significantly more items than available locations, some items may be randomly placed elsewhere.
messages.text: 如果项目明显多于可用位置，一些物品可能会随机到其他位置。

messages.name: PresetItemForm_parentLocations
messages.explanation: List item shown on the left in custom item placement, grouping together all location groups (currently just important locations)

messages.name: PresetItemForm_parentPlacements
messages.explanation: List item shown on the left in custom item placement, grouping together all item placement categories

messages.name: PresetItemForm_PresetItemForm
messages.explanation: Title of the custom item placement form

messages.name: PresetItemForm_resetButton
messages.explanation: Button shown in item preset form which can revert the custom item placement back to the default, based on the current options. This shows a yes/no confirm prompt

messages.name: Randomizer_createFileError
messages.explanation: Long explanation of why file creation might fail. First it gives the same advice as EldenForm_fileUnpackError, then mentions that Antivirus can stop the randomizer from writing files, then explains that the randomizer is 'safe' (does not modify files unless it needs to).
messages.english_text:
Error: Failed to create file. Make sure the randomizer is unpacked to disk with all of the files kept together, and make sure no Antivirus programs are interfering. The randomizer will only modify files in its own directory or in the game directory.
{0}
messages.text:
错误：创建文件失败。确保已将随机生成器解压到磁盘，并将所有文件置于同一目录下，以及排除杀毒程序干扰。随机生成器只会修改自身目录或游戏目录下的文件。
{0}

messages.name: Randomizer_editPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is modifying game parameters etc. to randomize them

messages.name: Randomizer_enemyPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is doing enemy randomization

messages.name: Randomizer_itemPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is doing item randomization

messages.name: Randomizer_keyItemError
messages.explanation: Error message from the randomizer which indicates an internal logic error, when has to put a key item in an area and can't find any applicable locations. This happens like 5% or 10% of the time depending on how difficult the randomization is to calculate.
messages.english_text: Could not place all key items... giving up now. This can happen on some seeds or with some options.
messages.text: 无法放置所有关键物品...正在放弃随机。可能是某些种子或设置导致的。

messages.name: Randomizer_keyItemError
messages.explanation: Error message from the randomizer which indicates an internal logic error, when has to put a key item in an area and can't find any applicable locations. This happens like 5% or 10% of the time depending on how difficult the randomization is to calculate.
messages.english_text: Could not place all important items... giving up now. Try rerolling the seed, reducing the number of important items, or increasing the number of important locations.
messages.text: 无法放置所有重要物品...正在放弃随机。请尝试重roll种子、减少重要物品数量，或增加重要位置数量。

messages.name: Randomizer_loadPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar at the start of randomization, when reading and parsing game files

messages.name: Randomizer_mergeFogError
messages.explanation: Error shown when 'Merge mod directory' is incorrectly set to merge a mod directory for Elden Ring Fog Gate Randomizer. 'Merge order' refers to the fact that you have to run Item/Enemy Randomizer before Fog Gate Randomizer and then merge the first into the second, not the opposite way around
messages.english_text: Error: Invalid merge order for Fog Gate Randomizer. Carefully follow the instructions on the Fog Gate Randomizer mod page.

messages.name: Randomizer_mergeMissingError
messages.explanation: Error shown when 'Merge mod directory' is selected but the directory named {0} does not exist
messages.english_text: Error merging mods: directory {0} not found
messages.text: 合并mod错误: 找不到{0}目录

messages.name: Randomizer_mergeWrongDirError
messages.explanation: Error shown when 'Merge mod directory' is selected but the randomizer is already inside of the mod directory {0}, so it would use its own output as input, which would break it
messages.english_text: Error merging mods: already running from {0} directory
messages.text: 合并mod错误: 已从{0}目录运行

messages.name: Randomizer_saveMapPhase
messages.explanation: Progress from 0% to 100% in writing game map files (.msb.dcx format), at the end of savePhase

messages.name: Randomizer_savePhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar at the end of randomization, when all randomized files are written out to disk

messages.name: SearchScrollForm_act
messages.explanation: Standard dialog confirmation button

messages.name: SearchScrollForm_searchtext
messages.explanation: Label to enter search text, which is highlighted in the form. This can be seen by clicking any of the links like '30 checks' in item randomizer
